“yepi the khaththiyapanditha brakahmanapanditha gahapathi panditha samanapanditha nipuna kathaparappawada chalawedhi rupa wobhindantha manynye waranthi panynyagathena dittigathani, the panyhan abhisangkharithwa thathagathan upasangkamithwa puchchanthi gulhani wa patichchanthani wa: kathitha wissajjitha wa the panyha bhagawatha honthi niddittakarana; upakkhiththaka cha the bhagawatho sampajjanthi; atha kho bhagawatho thaththa; athirowathi yadidan panynyaya”yi.

dan mama kiyapu widiyata siddi tika wenawane, mehema yana emat eeka parama athurudahan wenawa, hamoma hithanne eya marila kiyala, namuth eyage birida tharaye kiya sitinawa, ohu jiwath wenawa kiyala eya pasak karamin, ohuge biken eeka ekaparama nada wenna gannawa sahena kalayakata passe, ithin nawathath me kathawa arambaa karanna emat kolge pawule udawiya ohu soya yanna gannawa, eka karanna tharam mowunata mudal madi, ekata klark hoda upayak kalpana karanawa ee mokakda me wadasatahana nawatha patan ganna, ethakota anugrahayakayange labena mudalin ohuwa hoyagena yanna puluwan, ithin kattiya ohu soya yanawa...

pebarawari 13, 1894: bahuthakshanika pasal pragnyapthiya sammatha kara ganna ladi. 1905: wiyana pasu saporishiya ෙpolietaknik pasal sisun sankhyawa dewana sthanaya himi. 1914: wideshiya sisun sandaha simawak thiyenawa kiyala, ema wasare di, polanthaye rusiyanu kotasak sisun samaharak 30% siyaluma.

4) adhika manasika aathathiya

dinaye nowa wena dawaswala awuth suwaya labaganna''yi owunta ki ya-. 15 samindranan wahanse ohuta uththara demin-, ''kairati-kayeni-, oba hama keneku ma sabath dinaye di thamage gona ho kotaluwa ho galen liha wathura dimata gena yanawa nowe da? 16 ese nami-, dasaata wasak thisse sathan wisin bandinu laba siti-, aabrahamige diyanayaka wu me sthriya ee bandhanayen sabath dinaye di mudanna yuthu wa thibuna nowe da''yi wadala seka-. 17 mese wadala wita un wahansege siyalu wiruddhawadihu lajjawata path wu ha-.

aacharyawarun watup wadi kirima sandaha karana illim rajaya salaka baliya yuththe, usas adhyapanaya thanikarama welandapola tharkanayata yatath kota, eya hudu mulya watinakamak athi deyak lesa salakimata kerena yojana mahinda chinthanayata erehiwa yana bawa wataha ganimini.
subadra akka kampas aawe aanduwe departhamenthu wala sahena kalayak sewaya karala wibhagayak liyala krushi pitayata enda hama awuruddakama haya hath denekuta thibba waramin.

shri lanka jathika rayifal sangamaya meheyawanu labu pistholayen wedi thabime jathika shurathawaliye standad diwishan tharaga anshaye jayagrahakayata himi anthar jathika prayogika wedi thabime sammelana sabhapathige padakkama ha kewala standad diwishan tharaga anshaye jayagrahakayata himi padakkama dina ganimata nawika hamudawe yoshitha rajapaksha samathwiya.walisara nawika hamuda wedi thabime pitiye di pasugiyada pawathi me shurathawaliye di samastha kandayam isaw (standad saha wiwrutha) shurathawa da, man wars man standad shurathawa da, kantha standad diwishan isawwe shurathawa saha anushurathawa da, kewala standad isawwe palamu, dewani saha thewani sthana da, kantha (wiwrutha) dewani ha thewani sthana da, kewala pradakshan isawwe thewani sthanaya da dina ganimata nawika hamudawa samathwiya.thriwidha hamudawa saha polisiya athulu diwayine pramukha pele wedi thabime kandayam 14k sahabhagi wu me shurathawaliye thyaga pradanothsawaya nawika hamudapathi wayis admiral jayanath kolambaage mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathwini.jathika rayifal sangamaye wathman sabhapathiwaraya lesa nawika hamudawe riyar admiral em.yu.ke.wi. bandara mahatha katayuthu karayi. .
